title: Learn Hiragana and Katakana!
notes: At this point you are extremely new to learning Japanese. Take your time to learn Hiragana and Katakana. Use this platform or any other platform you have in mind.

title: Learn your particles!
notes: Hurray! You know your hiragana! Which means you can read sentences in Hiragana and Katakana. Now focus on learning your particles and what they are used for. So you know when there's a break in words in a sentence.

title: Kanji! Kanji! Kanji!
notes: Now is a good time to start learning your kanji! If typing try your best to write kanji over hiragana. So that way you put it into your brain that this kanji means this! This part is a forever process, you will always learn kanji as long as you are learning Japanese. We recommend you use Jisho. It's an amazing site!
